DD_DATA_SNAPSHOT_ID,
DD_SNAPSHOT_PERSON_ID,
DD_SNAPSHOT_TIME,
DD_SNAPSHOT_REASON_ID,
DD_PROJECT_ID,

mapper.select:
select
from dd_data_snapShot_information_id where 1=1 AND DD_DATA_SNAPSHOT_ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
update dd_data_snapShot_information_id
DD_SNAPSHOT_PERSON_ID = #{ddSnapShotPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DD_SNAPSHOT_TIME = #{ddSnapShotTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DD_SNAPSHOT_REASON_ID = #{ddSnapShotReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DD_PROJECT_ID = #{ddProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where DD_DATA_SNAPSHOT_ID = #{ddDataSnapShotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
